data.feedback: All 9 user requirements are fully covered by the planned epics. File accuracy verified - all 'filesToModify' files exist. Backend API routes match frontend planned integrations. Existing patterns (get_it DI, abstract final class modules, Result pattern) are correctly followed. Minor issues are non-blocking.
issues: Backend missing /forgot-password endpoint for full password recovery support
Missing explicit package additions in first epic (flutter_bloc, go_router, fl_chart, health, web_socket_channel, firebase_messaging)
suggestions: Add explicit package list to epic-flutter-foundation
Consider separate backend story for forgot-password endpoint
